leaving a long tail to sew wings to body ©heliinä swerdlyk www heliina com assembling stuff the body push the nylon stocking into the body so that the opening is matched up with the opening of the body fill with the pvc pellets or plastic beads this gives it a bit of weight in the body so it doesn t keep falling over due to his or her big head and the nylon stocking keeps the pellets or beads from falling out through any holes in the crochet knot the nylon and cut off any excess stuff any empty spots of the body with polyfill stuffing sew head to body sew wings to body cut the pipe cleaner in 2 pieces and shape a heart on one end cut the other end to desired length and poke into his or her little head add some dabs of glue to hold them in place you are finished and ready to play pattern
